channel.title: Uthora - Bringing '06 Back
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.uthora.com/img/threadlogo.png[/img][/center]
[B]Previously FtpScape[/B] [SPOILER=Permission to use original source] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/aa3b29d2b8ea69c60cd982ff44751378.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[IMG]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/website_zpsfxy6ynxz.gif[/img]
[B]Looking for the perfect remake? Tired of all these one month long ones? Uthora is here to provide you with that long lasting remake experience. We aren't here to last one month and be gone, we will be here for years to come. With the drive and dedication from our staff team, we promise to provide the most authentic experience we can.[/B]
[SPOILER=Development Process]
Phase One:
[ul][*]Periodic Closed Alpha Testing [*]F2P Zones working 100% [*]F2P Quests working 100%[/ul]
Phase Two:
[ul][*]Open Beta Test of all F2P Zones/Content [*]Bug Repair [*]Open Release of F2P Content.[/ul]
Phase Three:
[ul][*]Periodic Closed Alpha Testing [*]P2P Zones working 100% [*]P2P Skill Development [*]P2P Quest Development [*]Add Lost City Quest [*]Add Druidic Ritual Quest [*]Add Monkey Madness Quest[/ul]
Phase Four:
[ul][*]Open Beta of P2P Zones/Content [*]Bug Repair [*]Open Release of P2P Content[/ul]
[/SPOILER]
[COLOR=RED]The [b]red[/b] color code means the feature has not yet been started.[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]The [b]orange[/b] color code means the feature has been started and is under construction.[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]The [b]green[/b] color code means the feature has been finished.[/COLOR]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
[ul][*][color=GREEN]All bones bury-able[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Every prayer working properly[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR] [*][color=Orange]Bones on altar[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
[ul][*][color=GREEN]Emptying and refilling rocks[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]All ores can be mined[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Prospecting[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Smithing[/b]
[ul][*][color=GREEN]All bars can be forged into items[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]All equipment can be produced[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[ul][*][color=GREEN]All fish can be caught[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Correct item requirements[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Fishing spots located all around the world[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Correct animations[/COLOR] [*][color=Orange]Moving fishing locations[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]
[ul][*][color=GREEN]Picking wheat[/COLOR] [*][color=Orange]Filling flour bin[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Bread[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Pizza[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Cakes[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Potatoes[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Eating food (in pieces)[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Correct animation and timing used[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b]
[ul][*][color=GREEN]All logs light able[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Correct animations[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Clipped[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [b]Music and Sounds[/b]
[ul][*][color=RED]All skilling sounds[/COLOR] [*][color=RED]Various attacking sounds[/COLOR] [*][color=RED]Music on region of player[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [b]Quests[/b]
[ul][*][color=GREEN]Cook's Assistant[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Pirate's Treasure[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Sheep shearer[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Pirate's Treasure[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Restless Ghost[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Ernest the Chicken[/COLOR] [*][color=GREEN]Rune Mysteries[/COLOR] [*]Romeo and Juliet[/ul]
[SPOILER=Media] [B]More Media coming...[/B] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/203c104c73a407b70dd74ff3abe6c3ea.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/f6707409c431fc7e8b7c65bd97830808.png[/img] [/SPOILER]

item.title: Uthora - Bringing '06 Back
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:

This section isn’t for advertising any offending links will be removed.

If you don’t have anything to add don’t bother bumping this.

item.title: Uthora - Bringing '06 Back
item.dc:creator: @jniemiec jniemiec
item.description:
@jniemiec wrote:

[center][/center]

[B]Previously FtpScape[/B]
[SPOILER=Permission to use original source]

[/SPOILER]

[B]Looking for the perfect remake? Tired of all these one month long ones? Uthora is here to provide you with that long lasting remake experience.
We aren’t here to last one month and be gone, we will be here for years to come. With the drive and dedication from our staff team, we promise to
provide the most authentic experience we can.[/B]

[SPOILER=Development Process]

Phase One:

[ul][]Periodic Closed Alpha Testing
[]F2P Zones working 100%
[*]F2P Quests working 100%[/ul]

Phase Two:

[ul][]Open Beta Test of all F2P Zones/Content
[]Bug Repair
[*]Open Release of F2P Content.[/ul]

Phase Three:

[ul][]Periodic Closed Alpha Testing
[]P2P Zones working 100%
[]P2P Skill Development
[]P2P Quest Development
[]Add Lost City Quest
[]Add Druidic Ritual Quest
[*]Add Monkey Madness Quest[/ul]

Phase Four:

[ul][]Open Beta of P2P Zones/Content
[]Bug Repair
[*]Open Release of P2P Content[/ul]

[/SPOILER]

[COLOR=RED]The red color code means the feature has not yet been started.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]The orange color code means the feature has been started and is under construction.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=GREEN]The green color code means the feature has been finished.[/COLOR]

Prayer

[ul][][color=GREEN]All bones bury-able[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Every prayer working properly[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR]
[][color=Orange]Bones on altar[/COLOR][/ul]

Mining

[ul][][color=GREEN]Emptying and refilling rocks[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]All ores can be mined[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Prospecting[/COLOR]
[*][color=GREEN]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR][/ul]

Smithing

[ul][][color=GREEN]All bars can be forged into items[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]All equipment can be produced[/COLOR]
[*][color=GREEN]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/COLOR][/ul]

Fishing

[ul][][color=GREEN]All fish can be caught[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Correct item requirements[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Fishing spots located all around the world[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Correct animations[/COLOR]
[*][color=Orange]Moving fishing locations[/COLOR][/ul]

Cooking

[ul][][color=GREEN]Picking wheat[/COLOR]
[][color=Orange]Filling flour bin[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Bread[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Pizza[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Cakes[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Potatoes[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Eating food (in pieces)[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Correct animation and timing used[/COLOR][/ul]

Firemaking

[ul][][color=GREEN]All logs light able[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Correct animations[/COLOR]
[*][color=GREEN]Clipped[/COLOR][/ul]

Music and Sounds

[ul][][color=RED]All skilling sounds[/COLOR]
[][color=RED]Various attacking sounds[/COLOR]
[*][color=RED]Music on region of player[/COLOR][/ul]

Quests

[ul][][color=GREEN]Cook’s Assistant[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Pirate’s Treasure[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Sheep shearer[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Pirate’s Treasure[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Restless Ghost[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Ernest the Chicken[/COLOR]
[][color=GREEN]Rune Mysteries[/COLOR]
[]Romeo and Juliet[/ul]

[SPOILER=Media]
[B]More Media coming…[/B]


[/SPOILER]
